passage: During the Napoleonic Occupation of Spain, Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla, a Catholic priest of progressive ideas, declared Mexican independence in the small town of Dolores, Guanajuato on September 16, 1810 with a proclamation known as the "Grito de Dolores". Hidalgo built a large support among intellectuals, liberal priests and many poor people. Hidalgo fought to protect the rights of the poor and indigenous population. He started on a march to the capital, Mexico City, but retreated back north when faced with the elite of the royal forces at the outskirts of the capital. He established a liberal government from Guadalajara, Jalisco but was soon forced to flee north by the royal forces that recaptured the city. Hidalgo attempted to reach the United States and gain American support for Mexican independence. HIdalgo reached Saltillo, Coahuila where he publicly resigned his military post and rejected a pardon offered by Viceroy Francisco Venegas in return for Hidalgo's surrender. A short time later, he and his supporters were captured by royalist Ignacio Elizondo at the Wells of Baján (Norias de Baján) on March 21, 1811 and taken to the city of Chihuahua. Hidalgo forced the Bishop of Valladolid, Manuel Abad y Queipo, to rescind the excommunication order he had circulated against him on September 24, 1810. Later, the Inquisition issued an excommunication edict on October 13, 1810 condemning Miguel Hidalgo as a seditionary, apostate, and heretic.
question: What was the name of the priest who declared the Mexican independence?
translated_passage: ኣብ እዋን ናፖልዮናዊ መግዛእቲ ስጳኛ፡ ሚግኤል ሂዳልጎ ዪ ኮስታላ ዝተባህለ ናይ ገስጋሲ ሓሳባት ካቶሊካዊ ካህን፡ ኣብታ ብ16 መስከረም 1810 ኣብ ንእሽቶ ከተማ ዶሎረስ፡ ጓናጁዋቶ ናጽነት ሜክሲኮ ኣዊጁ፡ "ግሪቶ ደ ዶሎረስ" ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ኣዋጅ ሒዙ። ሂዳልጎ ኣብ መንጎ ምሁራትን ሊበራላውያን ካህናትን ብዙሓት ድኻታትን ዓቢ ደገፍ ሃኒጹ። ሂዳልጎ መሰል ድኻታትን ደቀባትን ንምሕላው ተቓሊሱ። ንሱ ናብ ርእሰ ከተማ ሜክሲኮ ኣብ ዝገበሮ ሰልፊ ጀሚሩ፡ ኣብ ወሰን ርእሰ ከተማ ምስ ምሩጻት ንጉሳውያን ሓይልታት ምስ ተፋጠጠ ግን ናብ ሰሜን ተመሊሱ ናብ ሰሜን ንድሕሪት ተመሊሱ። ካብ ጓዳላሃራ ጃሊስኮ ሊበራላዊ መንግስቲ መስሪቱ ግን ነዊሕ ከይጸንሐ በቶም ነታ ከተማ ዳግማይ ዝሕዙ ንጉሳውያን ሓይልታት ናብ ሰሜን ክሃድም ተገዲዱ። ሂዳልጎ ናብ ኣሜሪካ ክበጽሕን ንናጽነት ሜክሲኮ ኣሜሪካዊ ደገፍ ክረክብን ፈቲኑ። ሂዳልጎ ኣብ ሶልቲሎ፡ ኮኣሁይላ በጺሑ፡ ኣብኡ ድማ ብግልጺ ካብ ወተሃደራዊ ስልጣኑ ስልጣኑ ብምልቃቕ፡ ምክትል ንጉስ ፍራንሲስኮ ቬነጋስ ንዝሃበቶ ምሕረት ከም ዝነጸገት ንሂዳልጎ ኢዱ ንኽህብ ብምኽኣላ። ድሕሪ ሓጺር ግዜ ንሱን ደገፍቱን ብንጉሳዊ ኢግናስዮ ኤሊዞንዶ ብዕለት 21 መጋቢት 1811 ኣብ ዒላታት ባጃን (ኖርያስ ደ ባጃን) ተታሒዞም ናብ ከተማ ቺዋዋ ናብ ከተማ ቺዋዋ ወሰደ። ሂዳልጎ ንጳጳስ ቫላዶሊድ ማኑኤል ኣባድ ዪ ኲይፖ፡ ነቲ ብ24 መስከረም 1810 ኣብ ልዕሊኡ ዘቕረቦ ናይ ምውጻእ ትእዛዝ ንምስርዛር ኣገዲድዎ።ድሒሩ፡ እቲ ኢንክዊዚሽን ብ13 ጥቅምቲ 1810 ንሚግኤል ሂዳልጎ ከም መሰናኽልን ሄሮክን ዝውግእ ናይ ምውጻእ ኣዋጅ ኣውጺኡ።
translated_question: እቲ ንናጽነት ሜክሲኮ ዝኣወጀ ካህን እንታይ ስሙ?

passage: One way of proving that a given disease is "infectious", is to satisfy Koch's postulates (first proposed by Robert Koch), which demands that the infectious agent be identified only in patients and not in healthy controls, and that patients who contract the agent also develop the disease. These postulates were first used in the discovery that Mycobacteria species cause tuberculosis. Koch's postulates can not be applied ethically for many human diseases because they require experimental infection of a healthy individual with a pathogen produced as a pure culture. Often, even clearly infectious diseases do not meet the infectious criteria. For example, Treponema pallidum, the causative spirochete of syphilis, cannot be cultured in vitro - however the organism can be cultured in rabbit testes. It is less clear that a pure culture comes from an animal source serving as host than it is when derived from microbes derived from plate culture. Epidemiology is another important tool used to study disease in a population. For infectious diseases it helps to determine if a disease outbreak is sporadic (occasional occurrence), endemic (regular cases often occurring in a region), epidemic (an unusually high number of cases in a region), or pandemic (a global epidemic).
question: Who suggested that patients and healthy controls not only have to develop an infectious disease in order to establish an infectious disease?
translated_passage: ሓደ ዝተዋህበ ሕማም "ተላባዒ" ምዃኑ ዘረጋግጽ መንገዲ፡ ነቲ ኮች ዝብሎ ንምዕጋብ (መጀመርታ ብሮበርት ኮች ዝቐረበ)፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ተላባዒ ወኪል ኣብ ሕሙማት ጥራይ ክለለ ዝጠልብን ኣብ ጥዑይ ቁጽጽር ከምዘይርከብን፡ ከምኡ’ውን ነቲ ወኪል ዝላለም ሕሙማት ነቲ ሕማም ከም ዘማዕብሎን ዝጠልብ እዩ። እዞም ፖስቱላታት እዚኦም ፈለማ ኣብቲ ርኽበት ዝጥቀሙሉ ዝነበሩ ዓይነት ማይኮባክተርያ ዓሌት ዓሶ ከም ዘስዕብ እዩ ነይሩ። ናይ ኮች ፖስቱላታት ንብዙሓት ሕማማት ደቂ ሰባት ብስነ-ምግባር ክለኽይዎ ኣይክእሉን እዮም ምኽንያቱ ከም ጽሩይ ባህሊ ዝፍጠር ረኽሲ ዘስዕብ ረኽሲ ዘለዎ ጥዑይ ውልቀሰብ ፈተነ ረኽሲ ስለዘድልዮም እዩ። መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ፡ ዋላ’ውን ብንጹር ተላባዒ ሕማማት ነቲ ተላባዒ መዐቀኒታት ኣየማልኡን እዮም። ንኣብነት፡ ትረፖነማ ፓሊዱም፡ እቲ ጠንቂ ዝኾነ ስፒሮቸት ፍንጣጣ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ መርመራ (in vitro) ክበሃል ኣይክእልን እዩ - ይኹን እምበር እቲ ፍጡር ኣብ ራቢት ቴስት ክበሃል ይኽእል እዩ። ጽሩይ ባህሊ ካብ ከም ኣአንጋዲ ኮይኑ ዘገልግል ምንጪ እንስሳ ዝመጽእ ካብቲ ካብ ባህሊ ጻሕሊ ዝመጽእ ማይክሮብ ክውሰድ ከሎ ከም ዘገልግል ንጹር ኣይኮነን። ኤፒዲሚዮሎጂ ካልእ ኣብ ሓደ ህዝቢ ሕማም ንምጽናዕ ዝጥቀመሉ ኣገዳሲ መሳርሒ እዩ። ንተላባዒ ሕማማት ሓደ ለበዳ ሕማም ስፍሕ ዝበለ እንተኾይኑ ንምፍላጥ ይሕግዝ (ሓሓታዊ ተርእዮ)፣ ኣብቲ ከባቢ (ስሩዕ ተርእዮታት መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ኣብ ሓደ ዞባ ይኽሰት)፣ ለበዳ (ኣብ ሓደ ዞባ ዘይተለምደ ልዑል ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት)፣ ወይ ለበዳ (ዓለምለኻዊ ለበዳ)።
translated_question: ሕሙማትን ጥዑይ ቁጽጽርን ተላባዒ ሕማም ንምምስራት ተላባዒ ሕማም ከማዕብሉ ጥራይ ዘይኮነስ፡ መን እዩ ዝብል ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቡ?

passage: East Prussia enclosed the bulk of the ancestral lands of the Baltic Old Prussians. During the 13th century, the native Prussians were conquered by the crusading Teutonic Knights. The indigenous Balts who survived the conquest were gradually converted to Christianity. Because of Germanization and colonisation over the following centuries, Germans became the dominant ethnic group, while Poles and Lithuanians formed minorities. From the 13th century, East Prussia was part of the monastic state of the Teutonic Knights. After the Second Peace of Thorn in 1466 it became a fief of the Kingdom of Poland. In 1525, with the Prussian Homage, the province became the Duchy of Prussia. The Old Prussian language had become extinct by the 17th or early 18th century.
question: In what century was East Prussia part of the monastic state of the Teutonic Knights?
translated_passage: ምብራቕ ፕሩስያ ንመብዛሕትኡ ናይ ኣቦታት መሬታት ናይ ባልቲክ ኣረጊት ፕሩስያውያን ዓጸወ። ኣብ መበል 13 ክፍለ ዘመን፡ እቶም ተወለድቲ ፕሩስያውያን በቶም መስቀላውያን ቴውቶኒክ ፈረሰኛታት ተሰሪዖም። እቶም ካብቲ ስዕረት ዝደሓኑ ደቀባት ባልትስ በብቑሩብ ናብ ክርስትና ተቐይሮም እዮም። ኣብ ዝቐጸሉ ዘመናት ብሰንኪ ጀርመናዊ ምግባርን መግዛእትን ብሰንኪ ጀርመናውያን ዓብላሊ ብሄር ክኾኑ እንከለዉ፡ ፖላንዳውያንን ሊትዋናውያንን ድማ ንውሑዳት ይፈጥሩ ነበሩ። ካብ መበል 13 ክፍለ ዘመን ጀሚሩ ምብራቕ ፕሩስያ ኣካል ናይቲ ገዳማዊ ኩነታት ናይተን ቴውቶኒክ ፈረሰኛታት እያ ነይራ። ድሕሪ ካልኣይ ሰላም እሾኽ ብ1466 ዓ.ም.ፈ.፡ ፊፍ ናይ መንግስቲ ፖላንድ ኰነ። ብ1525 ምስቲ ፕሩስያዊ ክብሪ፡ እታ ኣውራጃ ዱኪ ፕሩስያ ኰነት። እቲ ናይ ቀደም ፕሩስያዊ ቋንቋ ክሳብ መበል 17 ወይ መጀመርታ መበል 18 ክፍለ ዘመን ጠፊኡ ነበረ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኣየናይ ክፍለ ዘመን ምብራቕ ፕሩስያ ኣካል ናይቲ ገዳማዊ ኩነታት ናይ ቴውቶኒክ ፈረሰኛታት?

passage: Before forming Queen, Brian May and Roger Taylor had played together in a band named Smile. Freddie Mercury (then known by his birth name of Farrokh "Freddie" Bulsara) was a fan of Smile and encouraged them to experiment with more elaborate stage and recording techniques. Mercury joined the band in 1970, suggested "Queen" as a new band name, and adopted his familiar stage name. John Deacon was recruited prior to recording their eponymous debut album in 1973. Queen first charted in the UK with their second album, Queen II, in 1974, but it was the release of Sheer Heart Attack later that year and A Night at the Opera in 1975 which brought them international success. The latter featured "Bohemian Rhapsody", which stayed at number one in the UK for nine weeks and popularised the music video. Their 1977 album, News of the World, contained "We Will Rock You" and "We Are the Champions", which have become anthems at sporting events. By the early 1980s, Queen were one of the biggest stadium rock bands in the world. Their performance at 1985's Live Aid is ranked among the greatest in rock history by various music publications, with a 2005 industry poll ranking it the best. In 1991, Mercury died of bronchopneumonia, a complication of AIDS, and Deacon retired in 1997. Since then, May and Taylor have occasionally performed together, including with Paul Rodgers (2004–09) and with Adam Lambert (since 2011). In November 2014, Queen released a new album, Queen Forever, featuring vocals from the late Mercury.
question: What was Freddie Mercury's birth name?
translated_passage: ቅድሚ ንግስቲ ምምስራቶም፡ ብራያን ማይን ሮጀር ተይለርን ኣብ ስማይል ዝተባህለት ባንድ ብሓባር ተጻዊቶም ነይሮም። ፍረዲ መርከሪ (ድሕሪኡ በቲ ናይ ፋሮክ "ፍረዲ" ቡልሳራ ዝብል ስም ትውልዱ ዝፍለጥ) ኣድናቒ ፍሽኽታ ስለዝነበረ ብዝያዳ ዝተራቐቐ መድረኽን ምቕራጽ ሜላታትን ክፍትኑ ኣተባቢዕዎም። መርከሪ ኣብ 1970 ናብታ ባንድ ተጸንቢሩ፡ "ኲን" ከም ሓድሽ ስም ባንድ ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቡ፡ ነቲ ዝፈልጦ ናይ መድረኽ ስሙ ድማ ኣጽኒዑ። ጆን ዲያቆን ቅድሚ ኣብ 1973 ብስሙ ምቕራጹ ናይ መጀመርታ ኣልበም ምቕራጹ ተቖጺሩ ነበረ።ንግስቲ ንመጀመርያ ግዜ ኣብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ብኻልኣይቲ ኣልበም ንግስቲ II ኣብ 1974 ኣብ ቻርት ዝገበረት ኮይና፡ ኣብ 1974 ግን ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይታ ዓመት ሸር ሀርት ኤክቶክ ምውጻእን ኣብ 1975 ኣብ ኦፔራ ዝነበረት ምሸትን እዩ ነይሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ዓለምለኻዊ ዓወት ኣምጺኡላ። እዚ ዳሕረዋይ ድማ "Bohemian Rhapsody" ዝብል መደብ ዝነበሮ ኮይኑ፡ ን9 ሰሙን ኣብ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኣብ ቁጽሪ ሓደ ዝጸንሐን ነቲ ሙዚቃዊ ቪድዮ ህቡብ ገይሩን ነይሩ። ኣብ 1977 ዝዓይነታ ኒውስ ኦፍ ዘ ዎርልድ ዝበሃል ኣልበሞም "We Will Rock you"ን "We are the Champions"ን ዝሓዘት ኮይና፡ ኣብ ስፖርታዊ ውድድራት መዝሙር ዝኾና እየን። ኣብ መጀመርታ 1980ታት ንግስቲ ሓንቲ ካብተን ኣብ ዓለምና ዝነበራ ዓበይቲ ናይ ስታድዩም ሮክ ባንድታት እያ ነይራ። ኣብ 1985 ኣብ ቀጥታዊ ረድኤት ዝገበርዎ ምርኢት፡ ኣብ ታሪኽ ሮክ ብዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ሙዚቃ ሕትመታት ኣብ መንጎ እቶም ዝዓበዩ ደረጃ ዝሓዘ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ 2005 ኣብ ኢንዱስትሪ ዝተኻየደ ዳህሳስ ዝበለጸ ደረጃ ሒዙ ይርከብ። ኣብ 1991 መርከሪ ብሰንኪ ብሮንኮፕኒሞንያ ሞተ፣ ንኤይድስ ዝተሓላለኹን ዲያቆን ድማ ኣብ 1997 ጡረታ ወጺኦምን።ካብቲ እዋን እቲ ጀሚሩ ጡረታ ወጺኡ።ካብ ሽዑ ጀሚሩ፣ ግንቦትን ተይለርን ሓሓሊፉ ብሓባር ይሰርሑ ነበሩ፣ እንተላይ ምስ ፖል ሮድጀርስ (2004–09)ን ምስ ኣዳም ላምበርትን (ካብ 2011)። ኣብ ሕዳር 2014 ንግስቲ ሓዳስ ኣልቡም ኲን ፎርቨር ኣውጺኣ፡ ድምጻዊ ድምጻዊ መርከሪ ዝሓዘት እያ።
translated_question: ፍረዲ መርከሪ ናይ ልደት ስም እንታይ እዩ ነይሩ?

passage: Groups share a fundamental kinship with the notion of symmetry. For example, a symmetry group encodes symmetry features of a geometrical object: the group consists of the set of transformations that leave the object unchanged and the operation of combining two such transformations by performing one after the other. Lie groups are the symmetry groups used in the Standard Model of particle physics; Point groups are used to help understand symmetry phenomena in molecular chemistry; and Poincaré groups can express the physical symmetry underlying special relativity.
question: What group shares a fundamental kinship with the notion of symmetry?
translated_passage: ጉጅለታት ምስ ኣምር ሲሜትሪ መሰረታዊ ዘመድ ይካፈሉ። ንኣብነት ሓደ ናይ ሲሜትሪ ጉጅለ ናይ ሓደ ጂኦሜትሪካዊ ነገር ናይ ሲሜትሪ ባህርያት ኢንኮድ ይገብር: እቲ ጉጅለ ካብቲ ነቲ ነገር ከምዘይተቐየረ ዝገድፍን ክልተ ከምዚ ዝኣመሰለ ለውጢታት ናይ ምውህሃድ ስርሒትን ሓደ ድሕሪ እቲ ካልእ ብምፍጻም ዝሰርሖ ስብስብ ትራንስፎርሜሽን ዝሓዘ እዩ። ናይ ሓሶት ጉጅለታት ኣብ መደበኛ ሞዴል ናይ ፓርቲክል ፊዚክስ ዝተጠቕሙ ናይ ሲሜትሪ ጉጅለታት እዮም፤ ናይ ነጥቢ ጉጅለታት ኣብ ሞለኪዩላዊ ኬሚስትሪ ንዘለዉ ናይ ሲሜትሪ ተርእዮታት ንምርዳእ ንምሕጋዝ ይጥቀሙ፤ ከምኡ’ውን ፖይንካረ ጉጅለታት ነቲ ኣካላዊ ሲሜትሪ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፍሉይ ተዛማድነት ክገልጹ ይኽእሉ።
translated_question: ኣየናይ ጉጅለ እዩ ምስ ኣምር ሲሜትሪ መሰረታዊ ዘመድነት ዝካፈል?

passage: The area now called Galicia was first inhabited by humans during the Middle Paleolithic period, and it takes its name from the Gallaeci, the Celtic peoples living north of the Douro river during the last millennium BC, in a region largely coincidental with that of the Iron Age local Castro culture. Galicia was incorporated into the Roman Empire at the end of the Cantabrian Wars in 19 BC, being turned into a Roman province in the 3rd century AD. In 410, the Germanic Suebi established a kingdom with its capital in Braga (Portugal) which was incorporated into that of the Visigoths in 585. In 711, the Arabs invaded the Iberian Peninsula, taking the Visigoth kingdom, but soon in 740 Galicia was incorporated into the Christian kingdom of Asturias. During the Middle Ages, the kingdom of Galicia was occasionally ruled by its own kings, but most of the time it was leagued to the kingdom of Leon and later to that of Castile, while maintaining its own legal and customary practices and personality. From the 13th century on, the kings of Castile, as kings of Galicia, appointed an Adiantado-mór, whose attributions passed to the Governor and Captain General of the Kingdom of Galiza from the last years of the 15th century. The Governor also presided the Real Audiencia do Reino de Galicia, a royal tribunal and government body. From the 16th century, the representation and voice of the kingdom was held by an assembly of deputies and representatives of the cities of the kingdom, the Cortes or Junta of the Kingdom of Galicia, an institution which was forcibly discontinued in 1833 when the kingdom was divided into four administrative provinces with no legal mutual links. During the 19th and 20th centuries, demand grew for self-government and for the recognition of the personality of Galicia, a demand which led to the frustrated Statute of Autonomy of 1936, and to the Statute of Autonomy of 1981, currently in force.
question: In which period was Galicia inhabited first?
translated_passage: እቲ ሕጂ ጋሊስያ ተባሂሉ ዝጽዋዕ ከባቢ፡ ኣብ ማእከላይ ፓሊዮሊቲክ ዘመን ብደቂ ሰባት ዝነብር ዝነበረ ኮይኑ፡ ስሙ ካብቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሚለንየም ቅድሚ ልደተ ክርስቶስ ብሰሜን ካብ ሩባ ዶውሮ ዝነብር ህዝብታት ሰልቲክ ስሙ ይወስድ፡ ኣብቲ ብዓቢኡ ምስቲ ናይ ዘመነ ሓጺን ካትሮ ባህሊ ዝጋጠም ዞባ። ጋሊስያ ኣብ መወዳእታ ውግእ ካንታብሪያ ኣብ 19 ቅድሚ ልደተ ክርስቶስ ኣብ ግዝኣት ሮማ ተሓዊሳ ኣብ 3ይ ክፍለ ዘመን ልደተ ክርስቶስ ናብ ኣውራጃ ሮማ ተቐይራ። ኣብ 410 ጀርመናዊ ሱቢ ኣብ ብራጋ (ፖርቱጋል) ርእሰ ከተማኣ ዘለዋ መንግስቲ መስረተት እዚ ድማ ኣብቲ ናይ ቪሲጎት ኣብ 585 ተሓዊሱ ዝነበረ 711 ዓ.ም. ኣብ ማእከላይ ዘመን ንግስነት ጋሊስያ ሓሓሊፋ ብናይ ገዛእ ርእሳ ነገስታት ትመሓደር ነበረት፡ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ግን ንመንግስቲ ልዮን፡ ድሒሩ ድማ ናብ ካስቲል ሊግ ተሰቒላ፡ ናይ ገዛእ ርእሳ ሕጋውን ልማናውን ኣሰራርሓን ስብእናኣን እናዓቀበት። ካብ መበል 13 ክፍለ ዘመን ጀሚሩ ነገስታት ካስቲል ከም ነገስታት ጋሊስያ ከም ነገስታት ጋሊስያ፡ ሓደ ኣዲያንታታዶ-ሞር ሸመ፡ እቲ ምምስሳል ናብ ኣመሓዳሪን ሓለቓ ሓለቓ ሓለቓን መንግስቲ ጋሊዛ ካብ መወዳእታ ዓመታት መበል 15 ክፍለ ዘመን ሓሊፉ። እቲ ኣመሓዳሪ ንሓቀኛ ኦዲኤንሲያ ዶ ረይኖ ደ ጋሊስያ ዝበሃል ንጉሳዊ ቤት ፍርዲን መንግስታዊ ኣካልን እውን መሪሑ። ካብ መበል 16 ክፍለ ዘመን ጀሚሩ፡ ውክልናን ድምጽን ንግስነት ብጉባኤ ምክትላትን ወከልትን ከተማታት ንግስነት፡ ኮርተስ ወይ ጁንታ ናይ ንግስነት ጋሊስያ፡ ኣብ 1833 ኣብ ኣርባዕተ ምምሕዳራዊ ኣውራጃታት ምስተኸፋፈለ ብሓይሊ ዘይተቐጽዐ ትካል፡ ብኮርተስ ወይ ጁንታ ናይ ንግስነት ጋሊስያ ዝእከብ ዝነበረ ኣኼባ ተታሒዙ። ኣብ መበል 19ን 20ን ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ጠለብ ንርእሰ-ምሕደራን ንኣፍልጦ ስብእና ጋሊስያ፡ እዚ ጠለብ እዚ፡ ናብ ተስፋ ዝቖረጸ ሕጊ ርእሰ-ምሕደራ 1936፡ ከምኡ’ውን ናብ ሕጊ ርእሰ-ምሕደራ ናይ 1981፡ ኣብዚ እዋን’ዚ ኣብ ግብሪ ከውዕሎ ዝደረኸ ጠለብ ዓብዩ።
translated_question: ጋሊስያ ኣብ ኣየናይ እዋን እዩ ዝነብር ነይሩ?

passage: In European history, the Middle Ages or medieval period lasted from the 5th to the 15th century. It began with the collapse of the Western Roman Empire and merged into the Renaissance and the Age of Discovery. The Middle Ages is the middle period of the three traditional divisions of Western history: Antiquity, Medieval period, and Modern period. The Medieval period is itself subdivided into the Early, the High, and the Late Middle Ages.
question: What period is the middle of the three traditional divisions of Western history?
translated_passage: ኣብ ታሪኽ ኤውሮጳ፡ ማእከላይ ዘመን ወይ ማእከላይ ዘመን ካብ 5ይ ክሳብ መበል 15 ክፍለ ዘመን ዝጸንሐ እዩ። ብውድቀት ምዕራባዊ ግዝኣት ሮማ ዝጀመረ ኮይኑ ናብ ህዳሴን ዘመነ ርኽበትን ተዋሃሂዱ። ማእከላይ ዘመን ማእከላይ እዋን ናይተን ሰለስተ ባህላዊ ምምቕቓል ታሪኽ ምዕራባውያን፡ ማለት ጥንታዊት፡ ማእከላይ ዘመንን ዘመናዊ ዘመንን እዩ። እቲ ናይ ማእከላይ ዘመን ግዜ ንባዕሉ ኣብ መጀመርታ፡ ኣብ ልዑልን ኣብ መወዳእታ ማእከላይ ዘመንን ይምቀል።
translated_question: ማእከል ሰለስቲአን ባህላዊ ምምቕቓል ታሪኽ ምዕራባውያን እንታይ እዋን እዩ?

passage: New York—often called New York City or the City of New York to distinguish it from the State of New York, of which it is a part—is the most populous city in the United States and the center of the New York metropolitan area, the premier gateway for legal immigration to the United States and one of the most populous urban agglomerations in the world. A global power city, New York exerts a significant impact upon commerce, finance, media, art, fashion, research, technology, education, and entertainment, its fast pace defining the term New York minute. Home to the headquarters of the United Nations, New York is an important center for international diplomacy and has been described as the cultural and financial capital of the world.
question: What is the most populous city in the United States?
translated_passage: ኒውዮርክ—መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ንከተማ ኒውዮርክ ወይ ከተማ ኒውዮርክ ትጽውዕ ነበረት ካብ ግዝኣት ኒውዮርክ ክትፈልዮ ትጽውዕ ነበረት፣ ካብዚኣ ድማ እታ ኽፋላ እያ፣ እዚ ኸኣ ኣብ ኣመሪካ እታ ዝበዝሐ ህዝቢ ዘለዋ ከተማን ማእከል ከተማ ኒውዮርክን እያ፣ ንሕጋዊ ስደት ናብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካን ሓደ ካብቶም ኣብ ዓለምና ዚርከብ ህዝባውን ስደት ፕረምየር ጌትዌይ እያ። ዓለምለኻዊት ናይ ሓይሊ ከተማ፡ ኒውዮርክ፡ ኣብ ንግዲ፡ ፋይናንስ፡ ሚድያ፡ ስነ-ጥበብ፡ ፋሽን፡ ምርምር፡ ቴክኖሎጂ፡ ትምህርትን መዘናግዒን ርኡይ ጽልዋ የሕድር፡ ንኒውዮርክ ደቒቕ ዝገልጽ ቅልጡፍ ናህሩ። ዋና ቤት ጽሕፈት ሕቡራት ሃገራት ዝነብረላ ኒውዮርክ፡ ኣገዳሲት ማእከል ኣህጉራዊት ዲፕሎማሲ ኮይና፡ ባህላውን ፋይናንሳውን ርእሰ-ማል ዓለም ተባሂላ ተገሊጹ ኣሎ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዝበዝሐ ህዝቢ ዘለዋ ከተማ እንታይ እያ?

passage: The Alps (/ælps/; Italian: Alpi [ˈalpi]; French: Alpes [alp]; German: Alpen [ˈʔalpm̩]; Slovene: Alpe [ˈáːlpɛ]) are the highest and most extensive mountain range system that lies entirely in Europe, stretching approximately 1,200 kilometres (750 mi) across eight Alpine countries: Austria, France, Germany, Italy, Liechtenstein, Monaco, Slovenia, and Switzerland. The Caucasus Mountains are higher, and the Urals longer, but both lie partly in Asia. The mountains were formed over tens of millions of years as the African and Eurasian tectonic plates collided. Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine sedimentary rocks rising by thrusting and folding into high mountain peaks such as Mont Blanc and the Matterhorn. Mont Blanc spans the French–Italian border, and at 4,810 m (15,781 ft) is the highest mountain in the Alps. The Alpine region area contains about a hundred peaks higher than 4,000 m (13,123 ft), known as the "four-thousanders".
question: What are the highest mountain range system that lies entirely in Europe?
translated_passage: እቲ ኣልፕስ (/Ælps/; ጣልያንኛ: ኣልፒ [ˈalpi]; ፈረንሳዊ: ኣልፕስ [ኣልፕ]; ጀርመናዊ: ኣልፐን [ˈʔኣልም ሞናኮ፡ ስሎቨንያን ስዊዘርላንድን ። ኣኽራናት ካውካሰስ ዝለዓለ እዩ፣ እቲ ኡራል ድማ ይነውሕ፣ ክልቲኦም ግን ብኸፊል ኣብ ኤስያ ይድቅሱ። ኣፍሪቃውያንን ዩራስያውያንን ቴክቶኒካዊ ጽላት ኣብ ዝጋጨዉሉ ዝነበሩ እዋን፡ እቲ ኣኽራን ኣብ ልዕሊ ዓሰርተታት ሚልዮናት ዓመታት እዩ ተፈጢሩ። ብሰንኪ እቲ ፍጻመ ዝመጽእ ብርቱዕ ምሕጻር ውጽኢቱ ድማ ብምድፍፋፍን ናብ ከም በዓል ሞንት ብላንክን ማተርሆርንን ዝኣመሰሉ ላዕለዎት ጫፋት ከረን ብምትዕንቓፍን ክለዓሉ ድዅዒታት ባሕረኛታት ኣስዒቡ። ሞንት ብላንክ ንዶብ ፈረንሳን ኢጣልያን ዝሽፍን ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ 4,810 ሜትር (15,781 ጫማ) ድማ ኣብ ኣልፕስ ዝለዓለ እምባ እዩ። እቲ ኣልፓይን ዞባ ከባቢ ኣስታት ሚእቲ ጫፋት ልዕሊ 4,000 ሜትር (13,123 ጫማ) ዝሓዘ ኮይኑ፡ "ኣርባዕተ-ኣስታት" ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ እዩ።
translated_question: ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ምሉእ ብምሉእ ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ዝርከብ ዝለዓለ ስርዓተ ሰንሰለት ኣኽራን እንታይ እዩ?

passage: The origins of the Samoans are closely studied in modern research about Polynesia in various scientific disciplines such as genetics, linguistics and anthropology. Scientific research is ongoing, although a number of different theories exist; including one proposing that the Samoans originated from Austronesian predecessors during the terminal eastward Lapita expansion period from Southeast Asia and Melanesia between 2,500 and 1,500 BCE. The Samoan origins are currently being reassessed due to new scientific evidence and carbon dating findings from 2003 and onwards.
question: Who are closely studied in modern research about Polynesia?
translated_passage: መበቆል ሳሞኣውያን ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ሳይንሳዊ ስነ-ስርዓት ከም ጀነቲክስ፡ ስነ-ቋንቋን ስነ-ሰብን ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ሳይንሳዊ ስነ-ስርዓት ኣብ ዘመናዊ መጽናዕቲ ብቐረባ ይጽናዕ። ሳይንሳዊ ምርምር ይቕጽል ኣሎ፡ ዋላ እኳ ብርክት ዝበሉ ዝተፈላለዩ ክልሰ-ሓሳባት እንተሃለዉ፤ ሳሞኣን ካብ ደቡባዊ ምብራቕ ኤስያ ኣብ መንጎ 2,500 ክሳብ 1,500 ቅ.ል.ክ.ን ኣብ እዋን ተርሚናል ንምብራቕ ንምብራቕ ላፒታ ዝነበረ ተርሚናል ላፒታ ካብ ዝነበሩ ኣውስትሮነዥያውያን ቅድሚኦም ዝነበሩ መበቆላውያን ምዃኖም ዝሕብር ሓደ ሓዊሱ። ኣብዚ እዋን እዚ መበቆል ሳሞኣን ብሰንኪ ሓድሽ ሳይንሳዊ መርትዖታትን ካብ 2003ን ንደሓርን ዝመጽእ ርኽበታት ዕርክነት ካርቦን ዳግማይ ይግምገም ኣሎ።
translated_question: ኣብ ዘመናዊ መጽናዕቲ ብዛዕባ ፖሊነዥያ መን ብቐረባ ይጽናዕ?

passage: Relations between Grand Lodges are determined by the concept of Recognition. Each Grand Lodge maintains a list of other Grand Lodges that it recognises. When two Grand Lodges recognise and are in Masonic communication with each other, they are said to be in amity, and the brethren of each may visit each other's Lodges and interact Masonically. When two Grand Lodges are not in amity, inter-visitation is not allowed. There are many reasons why one Grand Lodge will withhold or withdraw recognition from another, but the two most common are Exclusive Jurisdiction and Regularity.
question: What concept determines relations between Grand Lodges?
translated_passage: ኣብ መንጎ ግራንድ ሎጅታት ዝምድናታት ብኣምር ኣፍልጦ ዝውሰን እዩ። ነፍሲ ወከፍ ግራንድ ሎጅ ዝርዝር ናይ ካልኦት ዓበይቲ ሎጅታት ይሕሉ ዝብል ኣፍልጦ ይህብ። ክልተ ዓበይቲ ሎጅታት ኣብ ነንሕድሕዶም ኣብ ማሶናዊ ርክብ ክግንዘቡን ኣብ amity ከም ዘለዉን ይንገር፣ ኣሕዋት ናይ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ድማ ናይ ነንሕድሕዶም ሎጅ ክበጽሑን ብማዞን ክራኸቡን ይኽእሉ። ክልተ ግራንድ ሎጅታት ኣብ amity ኣብ ዘይህልዉሉ እዋን፡ ኣብ መንጎ ምብዛሕ ኣይፍቀድን እዩ። ሓደ ግራንድ ሎጅ ካብ ካልእ ትካል ኣፍልጦ ዝዕደነሉ ወይ ዝስሕብ ብዙሕ ምኽንያታት ኣሎ፡ እቶም ክልተ ዝበዝሑ ግን ፍሉይ ስልጣንን ስሩዕነትን እዮም።
translated_question: ኣብ መንጎ ግራንድ ሎጅስ ዝምድናታት ዝውስን ኣምር እንታይ እዩ?

passage: The Heian period (平安時代, Heian jidai?) is the last division of classical Japanese history, running from 794 to 1185. The period is named after the capital city of Heian-kyō, or modern Kyōto. It is the period in Japanese history when Buddhism, Taoism and other Chinese influences were at their height. The Heian period is also considered the peak of the Japanese imperial court and noted for its art, especially poetry and literature. Although the Imperial House of Japan had power on the surface, the real power was in the hands of the Fujiwara clan, a powerful aristocratic family who had intermarried with the imperial family. Many emperors actually had mothers from the Fujiwara family. Heian (平安?) means "peace" in Japanese.
question: What period is considered to be the peak of Japanese imperial court?
translated_passage: እቲ ናይ ሄያን ዘመን (平安時代, Heian Jidai?) ናይ መወዳእታ ክፍሊ ናይ ክላሲካል ታሪኽ ጃፓን እዩ፣ ካብ 794 ክሳብ 1185 ዝጎዪ እዩ።እቲ እዋን ብስም ርእሰ ከተማ ሄያን-ኪዮ ወይ ዘመናዊ ኪዮቶ ዝተሰየመ እዩ። ቡድሂዝም፡ ታኦይዝምን ካልእ ጽልዋታት ቻይናን ኣብ ቁመቶም ኣብ ዝነበረሉ እዋን፡ ኣብ ታሪኽ ጃፓን ዘሎ እዋን እዩ። እቲ ናይ ሄያን ዘመን እውን ከም ጫፍ ናይቲ ጃፓናዊ ሃጸያዊ ቤት ፍርዲ ተባሂሉ ዝቑጸር ኮይኑ፡ ብስነ-ጥበቡ ብፍላይ ድማ ብግጥሚን ስነ-ጽሑፍን ዝፍለጥ እዩ። ሃጸያዊት ቤት ጃፓን ብግልጺ ስልጣን እኳ እንተነበራ፡ እቲ ሓቀኛ ሓይሊ ግን ኣብ ኢድ ዓሌት ፉጂዋራ እዩ ነይሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ምስ ሃጸያዊ ስድራቤት ዝተሓዋወሰ ሓያል ምሩጽ ስድራቤት እዩ ነይሩ። ብዙሓት ሃጸያት ብሓቂ ካብ ስድራቤት ፉጂዋራ ኣዴታት ነበራ። ሄያን (平安?) ማለት ብጃፓንኛ "ሰላም" ማለት እዩ።
translated_question: እንታይ እዋን እዩ ከም ጫፍ ሃጸያዊ ቤት ፍርዲ ጃፓን ዝቑጸር?

passage: The Scottish traveler James Bruce reported in 1770 that Medri Bahri was a distinct political entity from Abyssinia, noting that the two territories were frequently in conflict. The Bahre-Nagassi ("Kings of the Sea") alternately fought with or against the Abyssinians and the neighbouring Muslim Adal Sultanate depending on the geopolitical circumstances. Medri Bahri was thus part of the Christian resistance against Imam Ahmad ibn Ibrahim al-Ghazi of Adal's forces, but later joined the Adalite states and the Ottoman Empire front against Abyssinia in 1572. That 16th century also marked the arrival of the Ottomans, who began making inroads in the Red Sea area.
question: Who reported that Medri Bahri was a distinct political entity from Abyssinia?
translated_passage: እቲ ስኮትላንዳዊ ተጓዓዛይ ጀምስ ብሩስ ኣብ 1770 ከም ዝጸብጸቦ፡ ሜድሪ ባህሪ ካብ ኣቢሲንያ ፍሉይ ፖለቲካዊ ኣካል ምዃኑን፡ እተን ክልተ ግዝኣታት ብተደጋጋሚ ኣብ ግጭት ከም ዝነበራን ኣመልኪቱ። እቲ ባሕረ-ናጋሲ ("ነገስታት ባሕሪ") ምስ ኣቢሲንያውያንን ምስ ጎረባብቲ ኣስላማይ ኣዳል ሱልጣንን ከከም ጂኦፖለቲካል ኩነታት ብተመሳሳሊ ምስ ወይ ኣንጻር እቲ ጎረቤት ኣስላም ኣዳል ተቓሊሶም። መድሪ ባሕሪ በዚ ኸምዚ ኣካል ናይቲ ክርስትያናዊ ተቓውሞ ኣንጻር ኢማም ኣሕመድ ኢብን ኢብራሂም ኣል-ጋዚ ናይ ሓይልታት ኣዳል እዩ ነይሩ፣ ድሒሩ ግን ናብ ኣዳላይት ግዝኣታትን ኣብ 1572 ናብ ኣቢሲንያን ዝነበረ ናይ ኦቶማን ኢምፓየር ግንባር ተጸንቢሩ ኣብ 1572. እቲ መበል 16 ክፍለ ዘመን ንመምጽኢ ኦቶማን እውን ምልክት ገበረ፣ ንሱ ድማ ኣብ ቀይሕ ባሕሪ ንኽኣቱ ዝጀመረ እዩ።
translated_question: መድሪ ባህሪ ካብ ኣቢሲንያ ፍሉይ ፖለቲካዊ ኣካል ምዃኑ መን ጸብጺቡ?

passage: Infrared radiation is used in industrial, scientific, and medical applications. Night-vision devices using active near-infrared illumination allow people or animals to be observed without the observer being detected. Infrared astronomy uses sensor-equipped telescopes to penetrate dusty regions of space, such as molecular clouds; detect objects such as planets, and to view highly red-shifted objects from the early days of the universe. Infrared thermal-imaging cameras are used to detect heat loss in insulated systems, to observe changing blood flow in the skin, and to detect overheating of electrical apparatus.
question: What applications is infrared radiation used for?

passage: The city was founded in 734 BC by the Phoenicians as Ziz ('flower'). Palermo then became a possession of Carthage, before becoming part of the Roman Republic, the Roman Empire and eventually part of the Byzantine Empire, for over a thousand years. The Greeks named the city Panormus meaning 'complete port'. From 831 to 1072 the city was under Arab rule during the Emirate of Sicily when the city first became a capital. The Arabs shifted the Greek name into Balarm, the root for Palermo's present-day name. Following the Norman reconquest, Palermo became the capital of a new kingdom (from 1130 to 1816), the Kingdom of Sicily and the capital of the Holy Roman Empire under Frederick II Holy Roman Emperor and Conrad IV of Germany, King of the Romans. Eventually Sicily would be united with the Kingdom of Naples to form the Kingdom of the Two Sicilies until the Italian unification of 1860.
question: How long did Palermo remain a part of the Byzantine Empire?
translated_passage: እታ ከተማ ኣብ 734 ቅድሚ ልደተ ክርስቶስ ብፊኒኒያውያን ከም ዚዝ ('ፍሎወር') ኮይና ዝተመስረተት እያ። ድሕሪኡ ፓለርሞ ካርቴጅ ዝሓዘት ኮይና፡ ቅድሚ ኣካል ሪፓብሊክ ሮማ፡ ግዝኣት ሮማ፡ ኣብ መወዳእታ ድማ ኣካል ናይቲ ናይ ቢዛንታይን ግዝኣት፡ ንልዕሊ ሽሕ ዓመት ምዃኑ። ግሪኻውያን ነቲ ናይ ከተማ ፓኖርሙስ ዝብል ስም ዝሰምይዎ 'ምሉእ ወደብ' ዝብል ስም ሂቦምዎ። ካብ 831 ክሳብ 1072 እታ ከተማ ኣብ እዋን ኢማራት ሲሲሊ ኣብ ትሕቲ መግዛእቲ ዓረብ ኣብ ዝነበረትሉ እዋን፡ እታ ከተማ ፈለማ ርእሰ ከተማ ኮይና። ዓረብ ነቲ ናይ ግሪኽ ስም ናብ ባላርም ኣሰጋገርዎ፣ እዚ ድማ ሱር ናይ ፓለርሞ ናይ ሕጂ ስም። ድሕሪ ናይ ኖርማን ዳግመ-ምውራድ፡ ፓለርሞ ርእሰ ከተማ ሓዳስ መንግስቲ (ካብ 1130 ክሳብ 1816)፡ መንግስቲ ሲሲሊን ርእሰ ከተማ ቅድስቲ ሮማዊ ሃጸያዊት ሮማውያንን ቅዱስ ሮማዊ ሃጸይን ኮንራድ ራብዓይ ጀርመንን ንጉስ ሮማውያንን ኰነ። ኣብ መወዳእታ ሲሲሊ ምስ ንግስነት ናፖሊ ተጠርኒፋ ንግስነት ክልተ ሲሲሊስ ክሳብ ናይ 1860 ጣልያን ምውህሃድ ትፈጥር።

passage: Non-English terms for air defence include the German Flak (Fliegerabwehrkanone, "aircraft defence cannon", also cited as Flugabwehrkanone), whence English flak, and the Russian term Protivovozdushnaya oborona (Cyrillic: Противовозду́шная оборо́на), a literal translation of "anti-air defence", abbreviated as PVO. In Russian the AA systems are called zenitnye (i.e. "pointing to zenith") systems (guns, missiles etc.). In French, air defence is called DCA (Défense contre les aéronefs, "aéronef" being the generic term for all kind of airborne device (airplane, airship, balloon, missile, rocket, etc.)).
question: What is the Russian abbreviation for "anti-air defence"?

passage: The dynasty was founded by the Jurchen Aisin Gioro clan in Manchuria. In the late sixteenth century, Nurhaci, originally a Ming vassal, began organizing Jurchen clans into "Banners", military-social units. Nurhaci formed these clans into a unified entity, the subjects of which became known collectively as the Manchu people. By 1636, his son Hong Taiji began driving Ming forces out of Liaodong and declared a new dynasty, the Qing. In 1644, peasant rebels led by Li Zicheng conquered the Ming capital Beijing. Rather than serve them, Ming general Wu Sangui made an alliance with the Manchus and opened the Shanhai Pass to the Banner Armies led by Prince Dorgon, who defeated the rebels and seized Beijing. The conquest of China proper was not completed until 1683 under the Kangxi Emperor (r. 1661–1722). The Ten Great Campaigns of the Qianlong Emperor from the 1750s to the 1790s extended Qing control into Central Asia. While the early rulers maintained their Manchu ways, and while their official title was Emperor they were known as khans to the Mongols and patronized Tibetan Buddhism, they governed using Confucian styles and institutions of bureaucratic government. They retained the imperial examinations to recruit Han Chinese to work under or in parallel with Manchus. They also adapted the ideals of the tributary system in international relations, and in places such as Taiwan, the Qing so-called internal foreign policy closely resembled colonial policy and control.
question: When was the dynasty founded?
translated_passage: እቲ ስርወ መንግስቲ ኣብ ማንቹርያ ብዝርከብ ናይ ጁርቸን ኣይሲን ጂዮሮ ዓሌት ዝተመስረተ እዩ። ኣብ መወዳእታ መበል ዓሰርተው ሽዱሽተ ክፍለ ዘመን፡ ኑርሃሲ፡ ፈለማ ናይ ሚንግ ቫሳል፡ ዓሌታት ጁርቸን ናብ "ባነርስ"፡ ወተሃደራዊ-ማሕበራዊ ኣሃዱታት ከዳሉ ጀመረ። ኑርሃሲ ነዞም ዓሌታት ናብ ሓደ ውሁድ ኣካል ፈጢሩ፣ እቶም ተገዛእቱ ብሓባር ብህዝቢ ማንቹ ተባሂሎም ይፍለጡ ነበሩ። ኣብ 1636 ወዱ ሆንግ ታይጂ ካብ ሊያኦዶንግ ሓይልታት ሚንግ ክዝውር ጀመረ እሞ ሓድሽ ስርወ መንግስቲ ኣዊጁ፣ እቲ ቺንግ። ብ1644 ብሊ ዚቸንግ ዝምራሕ ሓረስቶት ዓመጽቲ ንርእሰ ከተማ ሚንግ ቤጂንግ ስዒሮምዎ። ሚንግ ጀነራል ዉ ሳንጉይ ምስ ማንቹስ ምሕዝነት ብምፍጣር፡ ነቲ ብልኡል ዶርጎን ዝምራሕ ዝነበረ ናይ ሻንሃይ ፓስ ናብቲ ናይ ባነር ሰራዊት ከፊቱ፡ ንዓመጽቲ ስዒሩ ንቤጂንግ ዝሕዝ ነበረ። ምውራር ቻይና ፕሮፐር ክሳብ 1683 ኣብ ትሕቲ ካንግሲ ሃጸይ ኣይተዛዘመን (R. 1661–1722)። እቲ ካብ 1750ታት ክሳብ 1790ታት ዝነበረ ዓሰርተ ዓበይቲ ጎስጓሳት ሃጸይ ቅያንሎንግ ክሳብ 1790ታት ናብ ማእከላይ ኤስያ ዝነበረ ምቁጽጻር ቺንግ ኣናዊሑ። እቶም ቀዳሞት ገዛእቲ ንማንቹ መገድታቶም ክዕቅቡ ከለዉ፣ ወግዓዊ መዓርግኦም ሃጸይ ክኸውን ከሎ ድማ ካንስ ብሞንጎላውያን ተባሂሎም ይፍለጡን ይድገፉ ዝነበሩ ቲቤት ቡድሂዝም፣ ኮንፉሽያዊ ቅዲታትን ትካላት ቢሮክራስያዊ መንግስትን ተጠቒሞም ይመሓደሩ ነበሩ። ንሃን ቻይናውያን ኣብ ትሕቲ ወይ ጎኒ ጎኒ ማንቹስ ክሰርሕ ንምቑጻር ሃጸያዊ ፈተናታት ዓቂቦም። ብተወሳኺ ኣብ ኣህጉራዊ ዝምድናታት፡ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ ከም በዓል ታይዋን ዝኣመሰሉ ቦታታት፡ ንውሽጣዊ ናይ ወጻኢ ፖሊሲ ዝበሃል፡ መግዛእታዊ ፖሊሲን ምቁጽጻርን ብቐረባ ዝመስል፡ ንርእዮተ-ዓለም ፍልስፍናታት ናይቲ ስርዓተ-ግብሪ ኣብ ኣህጉራዊ ዝምድናታት ኣመዓራርይዎ።

passage: Daylight saving time (DST) or summer time is the practice of advancing clocks during summer months by one hour so that in the evening daylight is experienced an hour longer, while sacrificing normal sunrise times. Typically, regions with summer time adjust clocks forward one hour close to the start of spring and adjust them backward in the autumn to standard time.
question: What is the length of daylight saving time?
translated_passage: ናይ መዓልቲ ምቑጣብ ሰዓት (DST) ወይ ናይ ሓጋይ ግዜ ኣብ ወርሒ ሓጋይ ሰዓታት ብሓደ ሰዓት ናይ ምግስጋስ ልምዲ እዩ፣ ምእንቲ ኣብ ምሸት ምሸት ሓደ ሰዓት ንሓደ ሰዓት ዝነውሐ፣ ኣብ ርእሲኡ ድማ ንቡር ናይ ጸሓይ ምብራቕ ግዜ ይስውእ እዩ። ከም ልሙድ፡ ናይ ሓጋይ ግዜ ዘለዎም ዞባታት፡ ሓደ ሰዓት ናብ መጀመርታ ስፕሪንግ ቀሪቦም ንቕድሚት ዝስራዕ ሰዓታት የስተኻኽሉ እሞ ኣብ ቀውዒ ናብ መደበኛ ግዜ ንድሕሪት ተመዓራሪዮም።

passage: Classical music is art music produced or rooted in the traditions of Western music, including both liturgical (religious) and secular music. While a similar term is also used to refer to the period from 1750 to 1820 (the Classical period), this article is about the broad span of time from roughly the 11th century to the present day, which includes the Classical period and various other periods. The central norms of this tradition became codified between 1550 and 1900, which is known as the common practice period. The major time divisions of classical music are as follows: the early music period, which includes the Medieval (500–1400) and the Renaissance (1400–1600) eras; the Common practice period, which includes the Baroque (1600–1750), Classical (1750–1820), and Romantic eras (1804–1910); and the 20th century (1901–2000) which includes the modern (1890–1930) that overlaps from the late 19th-century, the high modern (mid 20th-century), and contemporary or postmodern (1975–2015) eras.[citation needed]
question: In what century did the development of classical music begin?
translated_passage: ክላሲካል ሙዚቃ ስነ-ጥበባዊ ሙዚቃ ኣብ ልምድታት ምዕራባውያን ሙዚቃ ዝፍረ ወይ ሱር ዝሰደደ ኮይኑ፡ ንኽልቲኡ ቅዳሴ (ሃይማኖታዊ)ን ዓለማዊ ሙዚቃን ሓዊስካ። ተመሳሳሊ ቃል ካብ 1750 ክሳብ 1820 (ክላሲካል ፒሪድ) ዘሎ እዋን ንምምልካት እውን ክውዕል እንከሎ፡ እዚ ጽሑፍ’ዚ ብዛዕባ እቲ ሰፊሕ ናይ ግዜ ግዜ ካብ ብግምት 11 ክፍለ ዘመን ክሳብ’ዚ ሕጂ ዘሎ ግዜ ኮይኑ፡ ነቲ ክላሲካል ፔሪድን ዝተፈላለየ ካልእ እዋናትን ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ማእከላይ ስርዓታት ናይዚ ትውፊት ኣብ መንጎ 1550ን 1900ን ተቐልቂሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ናይ ሓባር ናይ ልምምድ ግዜ ተባሂሉ ይፍለጥ። እቶም ዓበይቲ ናይ ግዜ ክፍልታት ክላሲካል ሙዚቃ ከምዚ ዝስዕብ እዮም: እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ናይ ሙዚቃ ግዜ: እዚ ድማ ንማእከላይ ዘመን (500–1400)ን ህዳሴ (1400–1600) ዘመናትን ዘጠቓልል እዩ፤ እቲ ናይ ሓባር ናይ ልምምድ ግዜ፣ ንሱ ድማ ባሮክ (1600–1750)፣ ክላሲካል (1750–1820)፣ ከምኡውን ሮማንቲክ ዘመናት (1804–1910) ዘጠቓልል፤ ከምኡ’ውን መበል 20 ክፍለ ዘመን (1901–2000) ነቲ ካብ መወዳእታ መበል 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ዝነበረ ዘመናዊ (1890–1930) ዘጠቓልል፡ ካብ መወዳእታ መበል 19 ክፍለ ዘመን ዝነበረ፡ ልዑል ዘመናዊ (ማእከላይ መበል 20 ክፍለ ዘመን)፡ ከምኡ’ውን እዋናዊ ወይ ድሕረ-ዘመናዊ (1975–2015) ዘመናት ዘጠቓልል እዩ።

passage: Ali was assassinated in 661 by a Kharijite partisan. Six months later in the same year, in the interest of peace, Hasan ibn Ali, highly regarded for his wisdom and as a peacemaker, and the Second Imam for the Shias, and the grandson of Muhammad, made a peace treaty with Muawiyah I. In the Hasan-Muawiya treaty, Hasan ibn Ali handed over power to Muawiya on the condition that he be just to the people and keep them safe and secure, and after his death he not establish a dynasty. This brought to an end the era of the Rightly Guided Caliphs for the Sunnis, and Hasan ibn Ali was also the last Imam for the Shias to be a Caliph. Following this, Mu'awiyah broke the conditions of the agreement and began the Umayyad dynasty, with its capital in Damascus.

passage: Schwarzenegger began weight training at the age of 15. He won the Mr. Universe title at age 20 and went on to win the Mr. Olympia contest seven times. Schwarzenegger has remained a prominent presence in bodybuilding and has written many books and articles on the sport. He is widely considered to be among the greatest bodybuilders of all times as well as its biggest icon. Schwarzenegger gained worldwide fame as a Hollywood action film icon. His breakthrough film was the sword-and-sorcery epic Conan the Barbarian in 1982, which was a box-office hit and resulted in a sequel. In 1984, he appeared in James Cameron's science-fiction thriller film The Terminator, which was a massive critical and box-office success. Schwarzenegger subsequently reprised the Terminator character in the franchise's later installments in 1991, 2003, and 2015. He appeared in a number of successful films, such as Commando (1985), The Running Man (1987), Predator (1987), Twins (1988), Total Recall (1990), Kindergarten Cop (1990) and True Lies (1994). He was nicknamed the "Austrian Oak" in his bodybuilding days, "Arnie" during his acting career, and "The Governator" (a portmanteau of "Governor" and "The Terminator", one of his best-known movie roles).
question: When did Schwarzenegger begin to weight train?
translated_passage: ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ መበል 15 ዓመት ዕድሚኡ ናይ ክብደት ልምምድ ጀሚሩ።ኣብ 20 ዓመት ዕድሚኡ ኣብ ዋንጫ ሚስተር ዩኒቨርስ ተዓዊቱ 7 ግዜ ኣብ ውድድር ሚስተር ኦሎምፒያ ተዓዊቱ። ሽዋርዘነገር ኣብ ምህናጽ ኣካላት ፍሉጥ ህላወኡ ኮይኑ ጸኒሑ፡ ኣብቲ ስፖርት ብዙሕ መጻሕፍትን ጽሑፋትን ጽሒፉ ኣሎ። ካብቶም ኣብ ኩሉ ግዜ ዝሃንጹ ዓበይቲ ኣካላት ከምኡ’ውን እቲ ዝዓበየ ምልክት ምዃኑ ብሰፊሑ ይቑጸር። ሽዋርዘነገር ከም ናይ ሆሊዉድ ኣክሽን ፊልም ምልክት ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝና ረኺቡ። እታ ስርሒታዊት ፊልምኡ፡ እቲ ኣብ 1982 ዝነበረ ሴፍ-ኣንድ-ሶርሲሪ ቅኔ ኮናን ዘ ባርባራዊት እያ ነይራ፡ ንሳ ድማ ቦክስ ኦፊስ ሂት ኮይና፡ ውጽኢቱ ድማ መቐጸልታ ኣምጺኣ። ኣብ 1984 ኣብታ ናይ ጀምስ ካሜሮን ሳይንሳዊ-ልቢ ወለድ ትሪለር ፊልም ዘ ተርሚነተር ተራእያ፡ ንሳ ድማ ዓቢ ነቐፌታን ኣብ ቦክስ ኦፊስን ዝረኸበት ዓወት እያ ነይራ። ድሕሪኡ ሽዋርዘነገር ነቲ ናይ ተርሚነተር ገጸ ባህሪ ኣብ 1991፣ 2003ን 2015ን ኣብቲ ፍራንቸይዝ ድሒሩ ዝነበረ ምዕራፍ ዳግማይ ደጊሙዎ።ኣብ ብርክት ዝበሉ ዕዉታት ፊልምታት ከም ኮማንዶ (1985)፣ እቲ ዝጎዪ ሰብ (1987)፣ በላዒ (1987)፣ ማንታ (19989))፣ ድምር ምጽዋዕን (1990))፣ ፍሌጋል ኮፕን ፍልይ ዝበለን COPን ፍልይ ዝበለን (1987) ተራእየ። (1994)። ኣብ ግዜ ምህናጽ ኣካላቱ "ኣውስትርያዊ ጽሕዲ" ዝብል ሳጓ ተዋሂብዎ፡ "ኣርኒ" ኣብ ናይ ተዋስኦ ሞያኡ፡ ከምኡ'ውን "The Governator" (ናይ ፖርትማንተው ናይ "ኣመሓዳሪ"ን "The Terminator"ን፡ ሓደ ካብቲ ዝበለጸ ዝፍለጥ ናይ ፊልም ተራኡ) ዝብል ሳጓ ተዋሂብዎ።

passage: With the decline of the Roman Empire, Alsace became the territory of the Germanic Alemanni. The Alemanni were agricultural people, and their Germanic language formed the basis of modern-day dialects spoken along the Upper Rhine (Alsatian, Alemannian, Swabian, Swiss). Clovis and the Franks defeated the Alemanni during the 5th century AD, culminating with the Battle of Tolbiac, and Alsace became part of the Kingdom of Austrasia. Under Clovis' Merovingian successors the inhabitants were Christianized. Alsace remained under Frankish control until the Frankish realm, following the Oaths of Strasbourg of 842, was formally dissolved in 843 at the Treaty of Verdun; the grandsons of Charlemagne divided the realm into three parts. Alsace formed part of the Middle Francia, which was ruled by the youngest grandson Lothar I. Lothar died early in 855 and his realm was divided into three parts. The part known as Lotharingia, or Lorraine, was given to Lothar's son. The rest was shared between Lothar's brothers Charles the Bald (ruler of the West Frankish realm) and Louis the German (ruler of the East Frankish realm). The Kingdom of Lotharingia was short-lived, however, becoming the stem duchy of Lorraine in Eastern Francia after the Treaty of Ribemont in 880. Alsace was united with the other Alemanni east of the Rhine into the stem duchy of Swabia.
question: What became the territory of the Germanic Alemanni?
translated_passage: ምስ ምንቁልቋል ግዝኣት ሮማ፡ ኣልሳስ ግዝኣት ጀርመናዊ ኣለማኒ ኰነ። እቲ ኣለማኒ ናይ ሕርሻ ህዝቢ እዩ ነይሩ፣ ጀርመናዊ ቋንቋኦም ድማ ኣብ ላዕለዋይ ራይን (ኣልሳቲያን፣ ኣለማንያን፣ ስዋብያን፣ ስዊስ) ዝዝረብ ዘመናዊ ላህጃታት መሰረት ዝገበረ ናይ ዘመና ላህጃታት መሰረት ዝገበረ እዩ። ክሎቪስን ፍራንክስን ኣብ 5ይ ክፍለ ዘመን ድሕሪ ልደተ ክርስቶስ ንኣለማኒ ስዒሮም ምስ ውግእ ቶልብያክ ኣብ ዝለዓለ ጥርዙ በጺሖም ኣልሳስ ኣካል መንግስቲ ኣውስትራልያ ኰነ። ኣብ ትሕቲ ናይ ክሎቪስ ሜሮቪንጅን ተካእቲ እቶም ነበርቲ ክርስትያናት ይገብሩ ነበሩ። ኣልሳስ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፍራንካውያን ቁጽጽር ክሳብ እቲ ፍራንካውያን ግዝኣት ስትራስበርግ 842 ዝብል ማሕላታት ተኸቲሉ፡ ኣብ 843 ኣብ ውዕል ቨርዱን ብወግዒ ዝፈስስ ክሳብ ዝኾነ፤ ደቂ ደቂ ቻርለማግነ ነቲ ግዝኣት ኣብ ሰለስተ ክፋላት መቒሎምዎ። ኣልሳስ ኣካል ናይቲ ማእከላይ ፍራንሲያ ኮይና፡ እታ ብንእሽቶ ወዲ ወዱ ሎሃር I. ሎታር ኣብ መጀመርታ 855 ዓሪፋ፡ ግዝኣታ ድማ ኣብ ሰለስተ ክፋላት ተኸፋፊላ። እቲ ብሎሪሪንያ ወይ ሎረይን ዝፍለጥ ክፋል ንወዲ ሎታር ተዋሂቡ። እቲ ዝተረፈ ኣብ መንጎ ኣሕዋት ሎታር ቻርለስ ቻርለስ ዘ ራዛ (ገማሚ ምዕራብ ፍራንክዊ ግዝኣት)ን ሉዊስ ጀርመናዊን (ገማሚ ምብራቕ ፍራንኪኽ) ተኻፊሉ ነይሩ። ንግስነት ሎታሪንጅያ ግን ሓጺር ዕድመ ዝነበሮ ኮይኑ ግን፡ ድሕሪ ውዕል ራይበሞንት ኣብ 880 ኣብ ምብራቓዊ ፍራንሲያ ዝርከብ ጕንዲ ዱኪ ሎረይን ኮይኑ።ኣልሳስ ምስቲ ካልእ ካብ ራይን ንምብራቕ ኣሌማኒ ናብ ስዋብያ ዝነበረ ስዋብያ ንምብራቕ ምስታ ካልእ ኣለማንኒ ተጠርኒፉ ነበረ።
translated_question: ግዝኣት ጀርመናዊ ኣለማኒ እንታይ ኮይኑ?

passage: The phonograph disc record was the primary medium used for music reproduction until late in the 20th century, replacing the phonograph cylinder record–with which it had co-existed from the late 1880s through to the 1920s–by the late 1920s. Records retained the largest market share even when new formats such as compact cassette were mass-marketed. By the late 1980s, digital media, in the form of the compact disc, had gained a larger market share, and the vinyl record left the mainstream in 1991. From the 1990s to the 2010s, records continued to be manufactured and sold on a much smaller scale, and were especially used by disc jockeys (DJ)s, released by artists in some genres, and listened to by a niche market of audiophiles. The phonograph record has made a niche resurgence in the early 21st century – 9.2 million records were sold in the U.S. in 2014, a 260% increase since 2009. Likewise, in the UK sales have increased five-fold from 2009 to 2014.
question: When was phonograph disc the primary medium for music reproduction?
translated_passage: እቲ ናይ ፎኖግራፍ ዲስክ መዝገብ ክሳብ መወዳእታ መበል 20 ክፍለ ዘመን ንሙዚቃ ምብዛሕ ዝውዕል ቀንዲ መሳርሒ ኮይኑ፡ ነቲ ካብ መወዳእታ 1880ታት ክሳብ 1920ታት ክሳብ 1920ታት ብሓባር ዝነበርዎ ናይ ፎኖግራፍ ሲሊንደር መዝገብ ተኪኡ–ምስኡ። ከም ኮምፓክት ካሴት ዝኣመሰሉ ሓደስቲ ቅርጽታት ብጅምላ ዕዳጋ ኣብ ዝኣትዉሉ እዋን፡ መዛግብቲ ዝዓበየ ብጽሒት ዕዳጋ ዓቂቦም። ኣብ መወዳእታ 1980ታት ዲጂታል ሚድያ ብመልክዕ ናይቲ ኮምፓክት ዲስክ ዝዓበየ ብጽሒት ዕዳጋ ረኺቡ ነበረ፣ እቲ ናይ ቫይነል መዝገብ ድማ ኣብ 1991 ካብቲ ቀንዲ መስመር ገዲፉዎ ነበረ።ካብ 1990ታት ክሳብ 2010ታት ክሳብ 2010ታት፣ መዛግብቲ ብኣዝዩ ዝነኣሰ ደረጃ ዝተፈጥረን ዝሽየጥን፣ ብፍላይ ድማ ብስነ ጥበባውያን ብስነ ልቦና ዝተለቐቐ ብስነ ልቦና ዝፍኖን ብስነ ልቦና ዝለኣኽን ነበረ። መዝገብ ፎኖግራፍ ኣብ መጀመርታ 21 ክፍለ ዘመን ኒች ዳግማይ ትንሳኤ ገይርዎ ኣሎ – 9.2 ሚልዮን መዛግብቲ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ 2014 ተሸይጡ፣ እዚ ድማ ካብ 2009 ጀሚሩ ብ260% ወሰኽ ኣርእዩ።ከምኡ ውን ኣብ መሸጣ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ካብ 2009 ናብ 2014 ብሓሙሽተ ዕጽፊ ወሲኹ።

passage: Many popular museums, such as the San Diego Museum of Art, the San Diego Natural History Museum, the San Diego Museum of Man, the Museum of Photographic Arts, and the San Diego Air & Space Museum are located in Balboa Park, which is also the location of the San Diego Zoo. The Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego (MCASD) is located in La Jolla and has a branch located at the Santa Fe Depot downtown. The downtown branch consists of two building on two opposite streets. The Columbia district downtown is home to historic ship exhibits belonging to the San Diego Maritime Museum, headlined by the Star of India, as well as the unrelated San Diego Aircraft Carrier Museum featuring the USS Midway aircraft carrier.
question: Which museum is specified as being located in La Jolla?
mc_answer3: Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego
translated_passage: ብዙሓት ህቡባት ቤተ መዘክር ከም ቤተ መዘክር ስነ ጥበብ ሳንዲያጎ፡ ቤተ መዘክር ተፈጥሮኣዊ ታሪኽ ሳንዲያጎ፡ ቤተ መዘክር ሳንዲያጎ ማን፡ ቤተ መዘክር ስነ ጥበብ ስእላዊ ስነ-ጥበብን ቤተ መዘክር ኣየርን ህዋን ሳንዲያጎ፡ ኣብ መካነ እንስሳታት ሳንዲያጎ እውን ዝርከብ መናፈሻ ባልቦኣ ይርከቡ። ቤተ መዘክር ዘመናዊ ስነ ጥበብ ሳንዲያጎ (MCASD) ኣብ ላ ጆላ ዝርከብ ኮይኑ ኣብ ማእከል ከተማ ሳንታፌ ዲፖት ዝርከብ ጨንፈር ኣለዎ። ጨንፈር ማእከል ከተማ ኣብ ክልተ ተጻረርቲ ጎደናታት ክልተ ህንጻታት ዝሓዘ እዩ። ኣውራጃ ኮሎምብያ ኣብ ማእከል ከተማ ዝርከብ ታሪኻዊ ምርኢታት መራኽብ ናይቲ ሳንዲያጎ ማሪታይም ሙዚየም ዝምልከት ኮይኑ፡ ብኮኾብ ህንዲ ኣርእስቲ ዝኾነ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ምስኡ ዘይተኣሳሰር ናይ ሳንዲያጎ ናይ ነፈርቲ መራኽብ ቤተ መዘክር፡ ናይ ዩኤስኤስ ሚድዌይ ነፈርቲ መራኽብ ነፈርቲ ዝሓዘ ቤተ-መዘክር ናይ ሳንዲያጎ ናይ ነፈርቲ ተሸካሚ ቤተ-መዘክር እዩ።

mc_answer3: They labeled them as a small group of 'Tibet independence' secessionists and NGO activists intent on disruption
mc_answer4: They portrayed them as patriotic heroes
translated_passage: ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ንዝድግፍ ቲቤትን ንሰብኣዊ መሰላት ዝድግፍን ተቓውሞታት ምላሽ ሂቦም፡ ኣብቶም ዝያዳ ዕንቅፋት ዝኾኑ ሰልፈኛታት ኣተኲረን፡ ንኣብነት ‘ኣዝዩ ውሑድ ቁጽሪ ናይ ‘ቲቤት ናጽነት’ ዝዓይነቱ ገንዘባውያንን ንኣጻብዕ ዝቑጸሩ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ዝገልጹ ደለይቲ ፍትሒ ዘይኮኑ ደለይቲ ፍትሒ ዝብሎምን’ውን ኣብ ‘ምዝንባዕን ምትብባዕን ናይ ኦሎምፒክ ጸወታታት’ ጠለባ። ይኹን እምበር፡ ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና፡ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቶርች ሪለይ ዝድግፉ ህዝቢ ዝገልጽ ጽሑፋት ኣውጺኡ።
translated_question: ማዕከናት ዜና ቻይና ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ንዝነበሩ ኣዝዮም ዕንቅፋት ዝኾኑ ሰልፈኛታት ብኸመይ ገሊጾም?
translated_mc_answer1: ንእሽቶ ጉጅለ ‘Tibet Independation’ ዝብል ስያመ ስያመ ሂቦምዎም ፡ ኣብ ምዝንባዕ ንዝግበር ምዝንባዕ ዝዓለሙ ናይ ዘይመንግስታውያን ትካላት ገንዘባትን ዘይመንግስታውያን ትካላትን ።

passage: In response to pro-Tibet and pro-human rights protests, the Chinese media focused on the more disruptive protesters, referring for example to 'a very small number of 'Tibet independence' secessionists and a handful of so-called human rights-minded NGO activists' intent on 'disrupting and sabotaging the Beijing Olympic Games'. However, the Chinese media published articles about crowds supporting the torch relay.
question: What contrasting coverage did the Chinese media provide aside from the focus on disruptive protesters?
mc_answer1: It also published articles about crowds supporting the torch relay
mc_answer2: It only focused on the negative aspects
mc_answer4: It reported on international diplomatic disputes

translated_mc_answer2: ኣብቲ ኣሉታዊ መዳያት ጥራይ እዩ ኣተኲሩ ።

passage: The reefs at Funafuti have suffered damage, with 80 per cent of the coral becoming bleached as a consequence of the increase in ocean temperatures and ocean acidification. The coral bleaching, which includes staghorn corals, is attributed to the increase in water temperature that occurred during the El Niños that occurred from 1998–2000 and from 2000–2001. A reef restoration project has investigated reef restoration techniques; and researchers from Japan have investigated rebuilding the coral reefs through the introduction of foraminifera. The project of the Japan International Cooperation Agency is designed to increase the resilience of the Tuvalu coast against sea level rise through ecosystem rehabilitation and regeneration and through support for sand production.
question: According to the passage, what percentage of the coral at Funafuti has become bleached?
translated_passage: ኣብ ፉናፉቲ ዝርከቡ ረፍዲታት ዕንወት ኣጋጢምዎም ኣሎ፡ 80 ሚእታዊት ናይቲ መርዛም ድማ ብሰንኪ ምውሳኽ ሙቐት ውቅያኖስን ኣሲዳፊኬሽን ውቅያኖስን ከም ሳዕቤን ይንጸባረቕ። እቲ ስታጎርን ኮራል ዘጠቓልል መርዛም ምብብጣብ፡ ካብ 1998–2000ን ካብ 2000–2001ን ዘጋጠመ ኤል ኒኖስ ኣብ እዋን ኤል ኒኖስ ዘጋጠመ ምውሳኽ ሙቐት ማይ ከም ዝውስኽ እዩ። ፕሮጀክት ምሕዳስ ሪፍ ሪፍ ሪስቶሬሽን ቴክኒካት መርሚሩ ኣሎ፤ ከምኡ’ውን ተመራመርቲ ካብ ጃፓን ነቲ መርዛም ረፍዲታት ዳግማይ ምህናጽ መርሚሮምዎ ኣለዉ፡ ብመገዲ ምትእትታው ፎራሚኒፈራ። ፕሮጀክት ዓለምለኻዊ ትካል ምትሕግጋዝ ጃፓን፡ ብመንገዲ ኢኮስይስተም ምሕዋይን ምሕዳስን፡ ንገማግም ባሕሪ ቱቫሉ ኣንጻር ምውሳኽ ጽፍሒ ባሕሪ ምጽዋርን ንፍርያት ሑጻ ብዝድግፍ ደገፍን ንምጽዋር ዝተዳለወ እዩ።
translated_question: ብመሰረት እቲ ክፍሊ፡ ኣብ ፉናፉቲ ካብ ዝነበረ መርዛም ነገራት ክንደይ ሚእታዊት ይንጸባረቕ ኣሎ?

passage: The reefs at Funafuti have suffered damage, with 80 per cent of the coral becoming bleached as a consequence of the increase in ocean temperatures and ocean acidification. The coral bleaching, which includes staghorn corals, is attributed to the increase in water temperature that occurred during the El Niños that occurred from 1998–2000 and from 2000–2001. A reef restoration project has investigated reef restoration techniques; and researchers from Japan have investigated rebuilding the coral reefs through the introduction of foraminifera. The project of the Japan International Cooperation Agency is designed to increase the resilience of the Tuvalu coast against sea level rise through ecosystem rehabilitation and regeneration and through support for sand production.
question: What factors are attributed to causing the coral bleaching at Funafuti?
mc_answer1: Increases in ocean temperatures and ocean acidification
mc_answer3: Increases in ocean temperatures and ocean acidification
translated_passage: ኣብ ፉናፉቲ ዝርከቡ ረፍዲታት ዕንወት ኣጋጢምዎም ኣሎ፡ 80 ሚእታዊት ናይቲ መርዛም ድማ ብሰንኪ ምውሳኽ ሙቐት ውቅያኖስን ኣሲዳፊኬሽን ውቅያኖስን ከም ሳዕቤን ይንጸባረቕ። እቲ ስታጎርን ኮራል ዘጠቓልል መርዛም ምብብጣብ፡ ካብ 1998–2000ን ካብ 2000–2001ን ዘጋጠመ ኤል ኒኖስ ኣብ እዋን ኤል ኒኖስ ዘጋጠመ ምውሳኽ ሙቐት ማይ ከም ዝውስኽ እዩ። ፕሮጀክት ምሕዳስ ሪፍ ሪፍ ሪስቶሬሽን ቴክኒካት መርሚሩ ኣሎ፤ ከምኡ’ውን ተመራመርቲ ካብ ጃፓን ነቲ መርዛም ረፍዲታት ዳግማይ ምህናጽ መርሚሮምዎ ኣለዉ፡ ብመገዲ ምትእትታው ፎራሚኒፈራ። ፕሮጀክት ዓለምለኻዊ ትካል ምትሕግጋዝ ጃፓን፡ ብመንገዲ ኢኮስይስተም ምሕዋይን ምሕዳስን፡ ንገማግም ባሕሪ ቱቫሉ ኣንጻር ምውሳኽ ጽፍሒ ባሕሪ ምጽዋርን ንፍርያት ሑጻ ብዝድግፍ ደገፍን ንምጽዋር ዝተዳለወ እዩ።

passage: During this early period, it was more usual that neither major party grouping (Federalists and Democratic-Republicans) had an official leader. In 1813, for instance, a scholar recounts that the Federalist minority of 36 Members needed a committee of 13 'to represent a party comprising a distinct minority' and 'to coordinate the actions of men who were already partisans in the same cause.' In 1828, a foreign observer of the House offered this perspective on the absence of formal party leadership on Capitol Hill:
question: In 1813, what did the Federalist minority require to coordinate their actions?
translated_passage: ኣብዚ መጀመርታ እዋን፡ ክልቲኦም ዓበይቲ ውድባዊ ምጉጅጃል (ፌደራላውያንን ደሞክራስያዊ-ሪፓብሊካንን) ወግዓዊ መራሒ ከምዘይነበሮም ዝያዳ ልሙድ እዩ ነይሩ። ንኣብነት ኣብ 1813 ሓደ ምሁር፡ እቶም ናይ ፌደራሊስት ውሑዳት 36 ኣባላት፡ 13 'ንፍሉይ ውሑዳት ዝሓቖፈት ሰልፊ ክትውክል' እትብል ኮሚተ ከም ዘድልያን 'ንተግባራት ናይቶም ድሮ ውድባት ዝነበሩ ደቂ ተባዕትዮ ኣብ ሓደ ዕላማ ንምውህሃድ' ከም ዘድለዮም ይነግር። ኣብ 1828 ሓደ ናይ ወጻኢ ተዓዛቢ ናይቲ ባይቶ ነዚ ኣረኣእያ እዚ ብዛዕባ ዘይምህላው ወግዓዊ ውድባዊ መሪሕነት ኣብ ካፒቶል ሂል ኣቕረበ፤
translated_question: ኣብ 1813 እቶም ውሑዳት ፌደራሊስት ንተግባራቶም ንምውህሃድ እንታይ የድልዮም ነይሩ?

passage: The successful outcome of antimicrobial therapy with antibacterial compounds depends on several factors. These include host defense mechanisms, the location of infection, and the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic properties of the antibacterial. A bactericidal activity of antibacterials may depend on the bacterial growth phase, and it often requires ongoing metabolic activity and division of bacterial cells. These findings are based on laboratory studies, and in clinical settings have also been shown to eliminate bacterial infection. Since the activity of antibacterials depends frequently on its concentration, in vitro characterization of antibacterial activity commonly includes the determination of the minimum inhibitory concentration and minimum bactericidal concentration of an antibacterial. To predict clinical outcome, the antimicrobial activity of an antibacterial is usually combined with its pharmacokinetic profile, and several pharmacological parameters are used as markers of drug efficacy.
question: Which two key laboratory measurements are mentioned for characterizing antibacterial activity?
mc_answer1: Minimum inhibitory concentration and minimum bactericidal concentration
mc_answer3: Minimum inhibitory concentration and minimum bactericidal concentration
translated_passage: እቲ ዕዉት ውጽኢት ጸረ-ረኽሲ ፍወሳ ምስ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ውህደታት ኣብ ሓያሎ ረቛሒታት ይምርኮስ። እዚኦም ድማ ኣገባብ ምክልኻል ኣአንገድቲ፡ ኣቀማምጣ ረኽሲ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ፋርማኮኪነቲካውን ፋርማኮዳይናሚካዊ ባህርያት ናይቲ ጸረ-ባክተርያን ይርከብዎም። ሓደ ባክተርያ ዝቖመ ንጥፈት ጸረ-ባክተርያ ኣብ ምዕራፍ ዕብየት ባክተርያ ክምርኮስ ይኽእል እዩ፣ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ድማ ቀጻሊ ናይ መቦሊክ ንጥፈትን ምምቕቓል ዋህዮታት ባክተርያን የድልዮ። እዚ ርኽበታት ኣብ ናይ ላቦራቶሪ መጽናዕቲ ዝተመርኮሰ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ምድላዋት እውን ረኽሲ ባክተርያ ከም ዘወግድ ተረጋጊጹ ኣሎ። ንጥፈት ጸረ-ባክተርያታት ብተደጋጋሚ ኣብ ምህላዉ ስለ ዝምርኮስ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ መርመራ (in vitro) ባህርያት ጸረ-ባክተርያ ንጥፈታት ልሙድ ምውሳን ናይቲ ዝተሓተ ተዓጻጻፊ ምትእኽኻብን ዝተሓተ ባክተርያ ባክተርያዊ ምትእኽኻብ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ክሊኒካዊ ውጽኢት ንምግማት፡ ጸረ-ረኽሲ ንጥፈት ናይ ሓደ ጸረ-ባክተርያ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ምስ ፋርማኮኪነቲክ ፕሮፋይሉ ይወሃሃድ፡ ሓያሎ ፋርማኮሎጂካዊ መለክዒታት ድማ ከም ምልክታት ውጽኢታዊነት መድሃኒት ይጥቀሙ።
translated_question: ንጸረ-ባክተርያ ንጥፈታት ንምልላይ ክልተ ቁልፊ መለክዒታት ላቦራቶሪ ኣየኖት እዮም ዝጥቀሱ?
translated_mc_answer1: ዝተሓተ ናይ ምዕጋት ምትእኽኻብን ዝተሓተ ምትእኽኻብ ባክተርያ
translated_mc_answer3: ዝተሓተ ናይ ምዕጋት ምትእኽኻብን ዝተሓተ ምትእኽኻብ ባክተርያ

passage: The successful outcome of antimicrobial therapy with antibacterial compounds depends on several factors. These include host defense mechanisms, the location of infection, and the pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic properties of the antibacterial. A bactericidal activity of antibacterials may depend on the bacterial growth phase, and it often requires ongoing metabolic activity and division of bacterial cells. These findings are based on laboratory studies, and in clinical settings have also been shown to eliminate bacterial infection. Since the activity of antibacterials depends frequently on its concentration, in vitro characterization of antibacterial activity commonly includes the determination of the minimum inhibitory concentration and minimum bactericidal concentration of an antibacterial. To predict clinical outcome, the antimicrobial activity of an antibacterial is usually combined with its pharmacokinetic profile, and several pharmacological parameters are used as markers of drug efficacy.
question: What additional profile is combined with antibacterial activity to predict clinical outcomes?
translated_passage: እቲ ዕዉት ውጽኢት ጸረ-ረኽሲ ፍወሳ ምስ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ውህደታት ኣብ ሓያሎ ረቛሒታት ይምርኮስ። እዚኦም ድማ ኣገባብ ምክልኻል ኣአንገድቲ፡ ኣቀማምጣ ረኽሲ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ፋርማኮኪነቲካውን ፋርማኮዳይናሚካዊ ባህርያት ናይቲ ጸረ-ባክተርያን ይርከብዎም። ሓደ ባክተርያ ዝቖመ ንጥፈት ጸረ-ባክተርያ ኣብ ምዕራፍ ዕብየት ባክተርያ ክምርኮስ ይኽእል እዩ፣ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ድማ ቀጻሊ ናይ መቦሊክ ንጥፈትን ምምቕቓል ዋህዮታት ባክተርያን የድልዮ። እዚ ርኽበታት ኣብ ናይ ላቦራቶሪ መጽናዕቲ ዝተመርኮሰ ኮይኑ፡ ኣብ ክሊኒካዊ ምድላዋት እውን ረኽሲ ባክተርያ ከም ዘወግድ ተረጋጊጹ ኣሎ። ንጥፈት ጸረ-ባክተርያታት ብተደጋጋሚ ኣብ ምህላዉ ስለ ዝምርኮስ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ መርመራ (in vitro) ባህርያት ጸረ-ባክተርያ ንጥፈታት ልሙድ ምውሳን ናይቲ ዝተሓተ ተዓጻጻፊ ምትእኽኻብን ዝተሓተ ባክተርያ ባክተርያዊ ምትእኽኻብ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ዘጠቓልል እዩ። ክሊኒካዊ ውጽኢት ንምግማት፡ ጸረ-ረኽሲ ንጥፈት ናይ ሓደ ጸረ-ባክተርያ መብዛሕትኡ ግዜ ምስ ፋርማኮኪነቲክ ፕሮፋይሉ ይወሃሃድ፡ ሓያሎ ፋርማኮሎጂካዊ መለክዒታት ድማ ከም ምልክታት ውጽኢታዊነት መድሃኒት ይጥቀሙ።
translated_question: ምስ ጸረ-ባክተርያ ንጥፈት ተደሚሩ እንታይ ዓይነት ተወሳኺ ፕሮፋይል እዩ ንክሊኒካዊ ውጽኢት ንምግማት?

passage: The period preceding, and contemporary with, the Protestant Reformation saw the translation of the Bible into local European languages—a development that contributed to Western Christianity's split into Roman Catholicism and Protestantism due to disparities between Catholic and Protestant versions of crucial words and passages (although the Protestant movement was largely based on other things, such as a perceived need for reformation of the Roman Catholic Church to eliminate corruption). Lasting effects on the religions, cultures and languages of their respective countries have been exerted by such Bible translations as Martin Luther's into German, Jakub Wujek's into Polish, and the King James Bible's translators' into English. Debate and religious schism over different translations of religious texts remain to this day, as demonstrated by, for example, the King James Only movement.
question: Which famous Bible translation into German is mentioned in the passage?
translated_passage: እቲ ናይ ፕሮቴስታንት ተሃድሶ ቅድሚን እዋናውን ዝነበረሉ እዋን፡ ትርጉም መጽሓፍ ቅዱስ ናብ ከባብያዊ ቋንቋታት ኤውሮጳውያን ርእዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ንምዕራባውያን ክርስትና ኣብ ሮማዊ ካቶሊክን ፕሮቴስታንትነትን ብሰንኪ ኣብ መንጎ ካቶሊካውን ፕሮቴስታንት ትርጉማትን ዝነበረ ዘይምስምማዕ ኣብ መንጎ ካቶሊክን ፕሮቴስታንትነትን ንኽፍቀድ ኣበርክቶ ዝገበረ ምዕባለ (ዋላ እኳ እቲ ናይ ፕሮቴስታንት ምንቅስቓስ ብዓቢኡ ኣብ ካልእ ነገራት ዝተመርኰሰ እንተኾነ፡ ንልሙጽ ዝኾነ ናይ ሮማ ካቶሊክ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ምሕንጻጽ ዝተመርኮሰ እኳ እንተነበረ)። ኣብ ሃይማኖታት፣ ባህልታትን ቋንቋታትን ናይ በብሃገራቶም ነባሪ ሳዕቤን ብኸም ማርቲን ሉተር ናብ ጀርመንኛ፣ ጃኩብ ዉጀክ ናብ ፖላንዳውያን፣ ከምኡውን ናይ ንጉስ ጀምስ መጽሓፍ ቅዱስ ተርጐምቲ ናብ እንግሊዝኛ ዝኣመሰላ ትርጉማት መጽሓፍ ቅዱስ ተዋሲኡ እዩ። ኣብ ዝተፈላለየ ትርጉማት ሃይማኖታዊ ጽሑፋት ዝግበር ክትዕን ሃይማኖታዊ ምፍልላይን ክሳብ ሎሚ ይቕጽል ኣሎ፣ ከምቲ ንኣብነት ብንጉስ ያእቆብ ምንቅስቓስ ጥራይ ዝተራእየ።
translated_question: ኣብቲ ክፍሊ ኣየናይ ፍሉጥ ትርጉም መጽሓፍ ቅዱስ እዩ ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ?
